thread.title: LMTT, Crowell, Texas
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by LMTT, Crowell, Texas

author: LMTT, Crowell, Texas
title: LMTT, Crowell, Texas
text: We saw a sectional couch that we wanted online, walked into the Wichita Falls Home Zone store and Tony greeted us! We told him what we saw online and he took us to the couch! We wanted it that day, but didn't have the money with us. He set us up for 90 days same as cash and we had the couch in a week! We are enjoying our new leather couch!! It is perfect! Awesome buying experience! Low prices, great quality! Will definitely by buying from Home Zone again!!
